resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/71076</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>71076</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120606</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120606</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120606</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določanje sil in risanje silnic</string>
            <string language="en">Map Field Lines and Determine Forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden Sie auffangen Zeilen und 
feststellen Kräfte ab</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tracez les lignes de zone et déterminez les 
forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trace linhas do campo e determine forças</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tracci le righe del campo e determini le forze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι γραμμές πεδίων χαρτών και καθορίζουν τις δυνάμεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asocie las líneas del campo y determine las 
fuerzas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">S pomočjo magnetne igle in sile na vodnik ugotovimo silnice neznanega magneta.</string>
            <string language="en">Mapping magnetic field lines with the use of magnetic needle and force acting on a wire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnet</string>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">silnica polja</string>
            <string language="en">field line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Diagramm, das magnetisch ist, fangen 
Zeilen mit dem Gebrauch von magnetischer Nadel und der Kraft auf, die 
auf einer Leitung fungiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tracer le champ magnétique garnit de 
l'utilisation de l'aiguille magnétique et de la force agissant sur un
fil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Traçar o campo magnético alinha com o uso da 
agulha magnética e da força que agem em um fio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il tracciato del campo magnetico si allinea con 
l'uso dell'ago magnetico e della forza che si comportano su un legare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρτογράφηση των γραμμών μαγνητικών πεδίων με τη 
χρήση της μαγνητικής βελόνας και της δύναμης που ενεργούν σε ένα
καλώδιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asociar el campo magnético alinea con el uso de 
la aguja magnética y de la fuerza que actúan en un alambre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Zeile auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aimant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ligne de zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ímã</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linha do campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">magnete</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riga del campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνήτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμή πεδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imán</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">línea del campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
